description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1.Fixed an issue where full-screen mode does not take effect on some device models.
2.Added a delay for custom key inputs when sending text to prevent failures caused by low frame rates.
3.Auto-save operation settings for FPS display.
4.New feature: Automatic log display (when enabled, logs will be shown from game launch until the game starts rendering output, then automatically closed).
5.Simplified the layout of in-game menus.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复部分机型全屏不生效的问题
2.增加自定义按键发送文本的延迟防止帧数过低导致的发送失败的问题
3.自动保存FPS显示的操作设置
4.新增功能：自动显示日志（开启后将在启动游戏后至游戏开始输出画面前自动显示日志，之后会自动关闭日志）
5.简化游戏内菜单布局
